data.title: Nabi Biopharmaceuticals Acquires Univax Biologics
data.meta_description: On November 29, 1995, Nabi Biopharmaceuticals acquired life science company Univax Biologics
data.text: Nabi Biopharmaceuticals (NABI) has a broad product portfolio that modulates the immune system. Their research focuses on developing and commercializing novel vaccines and antibody-based therapies that prevent and treat infectious, autoimmune and addictive diseases, such as Staphylococcus aureus and hepatitis infections, and nicotine addiction.
